problem.markdown:
>>My image slider keeps changing height and I want it to stop. How can I fix that?<<
(!) Can't fix it. (x) Set the same height on everything. (x) Use one of the Slick slider settings. ( ) Use just hx-navslider.
[explanation] Setting everything to the same height (with css or a "height" attribute) will work, as will using the adaptiveHeight: false setting. [explanation]
